subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: The Scottish Premier League match Wednesday between Glasgow rivals Celtic and Rangers was postponed Monday after the death of the Motherwell captain, Phil O’Donnell, over the weekend. Motherwell’s next two games had already been called off, but Celtic asked for Wednesday’s match to be rescheduled out of respect for O’Donnell, a former Celtic player.
